organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: ' ' We want to give the treaty between Mexico and Chile greater depth and coverage than it has now .

Let's think step by step.

1. Mexico
2. Chile
3. (Implied) The international organization or body that oversaw the creation of the treaty.

The paragraph is discussing the treaty between Mexico and Chile, so the two countries are clearly identified as organizations. It's also implied that there is an international organization or body involved in the creation and oversight of the treaty.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Organization.

1. Mexico
2. Chile
3. (Implied) International organization or body overseeing the treaty.

The paragraph only mentions Mexico and Chile as organizations that are directly relevant to the topic. The implied international organization or body is only mentioned in relation to the treaty and is not the focus of the paragraph, so it can be considered irrelevant for the purpose of identifying organizations mentioned in the text.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Organization |
| --- |
| Mexico |
| Chile |
| (Implied) International organization or body overseeing the treaty |

The entities are presented in the same words as in the original paragraph, with each organization listed in a separate row under the "Organization" column. The implied international organization or body is included in the table to maintain accuracy to the original text.
